titleStmt.title: A Beautifull baybush to shrowd us from the sharp shovvers of sinne containing many notable prayers and meditations, being very profitable for all true Christians that delight to laud the Lord.
titleStmt.author: Wolfe, John.

notesStmt.note: Includes calendar of fasts and feasts.
Colophon reads: London, Printed by Ed. All. for Ed. White. 1610.
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
